dashboard.adminPrivileges: Admin Privileges: You have full access to manage customers, leads, staff, and more.
dashboard.lowStockMessage: You have {{count}} items below re-order level!

staffPage.noStaffFound: No staff members found. Click "Add New Staff" to get started!
staffPage.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete staff member "{{name}}"? This will also delete their associated login user account and cannot be undone.

customerProfile.customerNotFound: Customer data could not be loaded.
customerProfile.jobChartDescription: e.g., jobs completed vs. cancelled per month
customerProfile.noRecentJobs: No recent jobs found for this customer.
customerProfile.noRecentInvoices: No recent invoices found for this customer.
customerProfile.noRecentQuotesLeads: No recent quotes or leads found for this customer.

settingsPage.failedToLoadSettings: Failed to load settings or profile data.
settingsPage.permissionError: You do not have permission to update company settings.
settingsPage.failedToSaveProfile: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
settingsPage.passwordsMismatch: New password and confirm password do not match.
settingsPage.passwordMinLength: New password must be at least 6 characters long.
settingsPage.noAuthenticatedUser: No authenticated user found. Please log in again.
settingsPage.passwordChangeSuccess: Password changed successfully! You may need to log in again shortly.
settingsPage.failedToChangePassword: Failed to change password. Please ensure your current password is correct.
settingsPage.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log out and log back in, then try again.
settingsPage.weakPassword: New password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
settingsPage.networkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
settingsPage.operationNotAllowed: Operation not allowed. This could be due to a temporary issue or specific Firebase project settings. Please try again or contact support.
settingsPage.newEmailPasswordRequired: New email and current password are required.
settingsPage.emailSameAsCurrent: New email cannot be the same as the current email.
settingsPage.emailChangeVerificationSent: Email change initiated! A verification email has been sent to your NEW email address ({{newEmail}}). Please click the link in that email to complete the change. You may need to log in again with your new email after verification.
settingsPage.invalidNewEmail: The new email address is not valid.
settingsPage.emailAlreadyInUse: This email address is already in use by another account.
settingsPage.incorrectCurrentPasswordForEmail: Incorrect current password provided for email change.
settingsPage.logoUploadHelpText: Upload a logo (max 5MB, PNG, JPG, GIF)
settingsPage.invoicePrefixHelpText: e.g., INV- will result in INV-0001
settingsPage.nextInvoiceNumberHelpText: The next sequential number to use for invoices (e.g., 1 for INV-0001).
settingsPage.defaultTaxRateHelpText: Enter the default tax rate as a percentage (e.g., 20 for 20% VAT).
settingsPage.daysBeforeAppointmentHelpText: Send reminder this many days before the appointment.
settingsPage.jobCompletionEmailHelpText: (Sent when a job is marked complete)
settingsPage.daysAfterDueDateHelpText: Send reminder this many days after invoice due date.
settingsPage.daysAfterJobCompletionHelpText: Send review request this many days after job completion.
settingsPage.currencyCodeHelpText: The 3-letter ISO code for your primary currency (e.g., GBP, USD).
settingsPage.currencySymbolHelpText: The symbol to display before/after amounts.
settingsPage.decimalPlacesHelpText: Number of digits after the decimal point (e.g., 2 for 1.99).
settingsPage.decimalSeparatorHelpText: Character used to separate whole numbers from fractions (e.g., 1.99).
settingsPage.formatTemplateHelpText: Use {symbol} for currency symbol, {amount} for number, {code} for currency code. E.g., {symbol}{amount} or {amount} {code}
settingsPage.emailHelpText: Your email address (managed by login provider).
settingsPage.twoFactorAuthDescription: Enhance your account security with 2FA. This feature requires you to enter a code from your phone in addition to your password when logging in.
settingsPage.twoFactorAuthComingSoon: (Full 2FA setup and management functionality will be available in a future update.)
settingsPage.languageChangeHelpText: Choose your preferred language for the application.
